laranotcroft: Thinking of you. I'm sure your friends don't think for a second that you're a burden... But I feel you. I've not done anything social this year due to pain from my arthritis and Fibro. Take it easy and don't be too hard on yourself xxx

nancy_la: Sending you Love ❤ Take care of YOU.
trishdishworsley: You come across as strong when you share how you feel with a bunch of internet strangers. Thank you for being transparent. I so hope that you are feeling some relief today ❣️
lareesecraig: Sorry to hear you’re having a low day / time. Sending you all the love ❤️❤️❤️
nnkmll: Your pain is letting you down, you’re not letting your friends down.  I also have fibro (among other chronic things) and it’s so tough to live with constant pain, and it flaring up massively. I’m sure they love you, whether you’re with them in LA, or at home dealing with this massive flare up.  Sending gentle hugs your way. Hope this pain eases up a bit soon 🥰✨💖😽
sasha_75: Sending love @daniellevanier - will pop you a little dm with a pic I captured the other day x
trulymyblog: I hear you. You will be ok 😘
neeruslifestyle: Just giving you hugs ... sjkelly15: Your friends and those who love you, they understand, and you most likely give more when you are up than you ever take when you are down. wifeoffishermanbahamas: Hang in there you are an inspiration from someone just diagnosed with breast cancer
lifewithhols: I hope you feel better soon, sending you lots of love 💘

erinehm: Chronic pain is such a terrible thief of joy. It is cruel and unfair. I hope you find a little relief soon. x
queensandcats: I send you lots of love, dear Danielle
ted1ble: I can't imagine how you must feel, sweetness. ivyverdure: Sending you lots of love❤️❤️, your friends and your loved ones know...and don't care. You're not alone. ❤️❤️❤️

fromsarahlex: I’m sorry babe, I hope you get some relief soon x
kelly_of: Love you Danie, please keep going as you're an inspiration to us Spoonies with chronic illness. Rest is good for you, but mentally it will get to you, think of all the happy thoughts and just know we're all here because we love you! ❤️❤️❤️
imogenchristy: I hear you, thinking of you and anyone else dealing with a chronic condition right now. It’s cool to just feel shit about it, it’s a shit hand to be dealt! Xx
claire_h_williams: I hear you my love. This week I was finally diagnosed with a condition called ‘functional neurological disorder’ which basically means my wiring is all wrong. I constantly feel like I’m letting my friends and family down. But know you are loved by your friends, family and online family too!! Use this time to rest and treat yo self. The fact that in amongst all this you can kick out a fashion line AND shoes with M&S is fucking amazing. YOU ARE LOVED xxxxx
katecarrington28: Sending all of my love 💖 you will feel better soon, be really kind to yourself love
emmyjo27: Sending you all the love, my lovely - lots of R&R, be kind to yourself 🙌🏼😘 xx
pollydemetriou: Look how far you've come since our Ballet & adventure days 💗
traybo77: Sending love 💕 I was so sad to see you couldn’t make LA. I understand somewhat as I have anxiety and depression so miss out on lots of social events. But I’m sure you and Callie will have loads more fab times together. Hugs lovely xx
elenalucie: Oh DV, I’m so sorry 💔 Sometimes you don’t need to see the positives or find the good, sometimes it’s just really really shit. Love you xxxx
brokedirtyblonde: You are beautiful and you are strong! Things will get better ❤️💕🌈
nancy.wc: I’m so so sorry my darling this is so horrible. You can’t always put a positive spin on things but do remember how amazing you are to have accomplished so much despite what you go through every day. You’re incredible, love you to bits xxx

melissaswardrobe: 😩❤️ It’s so hard to deal with but feel better xx
theleasphere: Thank you for being so honest, it is much appreciated! I hope you’ll feel better soon. Sending you lots of love 💕
fouretout: Take care of U..... Sure they all understand, they love you, and u deserve that love... Kisses from here... 💋💋💋
amyduffin1991: It makes me so sad to see anyone suffering and it’s so hard to keep positive when the pain wins but I would just like to share that your honesty and openness about how you feel about and deal with chronic pain has helped me, another fibromyalgia sufferer when I’ve felt most alone and disheartened, so I can only imagine how many others you are helping too. myrebelstyle: I’m really sorry to hear this :( You have accomplished so so much despite your condition and continue to champion the way for fat girls but also those who have conditions that make life harder. kayleighjweb: hope you feel better soon beautiful, i can totally relate to this!! please don't feel like a burden. it's not your fault and if you pushed yourself you'd only end up feeling worse. sending all my love 💖
linnea0787: Your friends and family don't care about the things your health prevents you from doing with them, they care about you recovering and resting enough to live your life as best as you can.
selina_arora: I‘ve just broken my leg and ankle and am recovering from an operation. I’m in extreme pain and hate that I can’t do anything for myself. So I appreciate you must feel shit but just so you know there’s someone out there keeping you in their thoughts and getting strength from you 😊 I hope you feel better soon x
_holly_brails_: Thinking of you lovely, so much love out here for you x
miss_maartje: I’m glad you’re writing it down and getting it off your chest. People only see you up and about and don’t realise the dark other side to it. Love you heaps 💕
sybillagram: Love and hugs to you Babe. It’s normal and natural to feel so deflated by what you are going through.....but we all know you as one hellava fighter (no pressure). Luv ya ❤️❤️❤️
thisisldizzle: Hope you feel better lovely you are strong *hugs* Lucky theres some new goodies on Netflix this week ?
_sarah_hughes: I’m so sorry, it’s not fair. I also suffer from a chronic pain condition and have forgotten what it is like to be pain free, it’s so hard for people to understand. magentawillow: It's not your fault. You are not a burden, you are deeply loved by your many friends and they all understand that you have a chronic pain condition that you can't do anything about. I'm so sorry you missed out on LA xxxxx
